None.Name: Blessed Witchcraft
None.Description: Every 5 seconds, Warlock casts a spell on a friendly unit that makes it to take 15% less damage for 10 seconds.

None.Name: Blaze Bolt
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit fires burning blaze that deals 52 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 78 in total.
